context_of_use: The customer wants to track their orders to know the delivery status.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: to know the delivery status of their orders.
description: Allow customers to view order status and shipment tracking information.
triggering_event: Customer requests to track an order.
preconditions: Customer must be logged into their account.
Customer must have placed an order.
postconditions: Customer successfully views the order status and tracking information.
assumptions: The customer has an active account.
The order tracking information is available in the system.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to track their orders.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of tracking information provided.
main_flow: 1. Customer requests to track an order â†’ System retrieves order status and tracking information.
2. System displays the order status and tracking information to the customer.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 1): If the order is not found, then the system displays an error message indicating that the order cannot be tracked.
